install.name: Authentication - Joosco
install.author: Dhjiz Trevian
install.description: Handles user authentication to an Alfresco Repository

param.name: alf-url
param.label: Alfresco API URL
param.description: This is the URL of the API on an Alfresco Repository. You can take the default value and replace the 'example.com' part with the address of your Alfresco server. If Alfresco is on the same server, don't write 'localhost'.
